title: Holiday gift alert: Document 365 makes it easy to work with PDFs, now only $70
content:
Macworld

While the holiday season is quickly approaching, you don’t need to wait until Black Friday to scour for gift ideas for friends, family, or colleagues. During our limited-time promotion, you can get ahead of gift shopping with some unique yet practical gifts, like Document 365.

Designed to make working with PDFs more seamless, Document 365 is any professional worker, student, or casual user’s best friend. Now through October 31st, you can grab lifetime access for only $69.97 (reg. $299)!

What is Document 365? It’s a PDF reader, office manager, and more in one app. You can seamlessly annotate and edit PDFs, sign documents, fill forms, organize and split files, combine PDFs, scan text using OCR, and much more. Secure your documents with password protection and watermarks when you need to share with others and access all online services from any device, anywhere you need.

You can even take your work on the go, as you can access PDFs and other documents through the PDF Reader mobile app. No wonder Document 365 was awarded “Best Utility App” by the App Store!

This holiday season, give the ultimate gift: streamlined productivity.

Get a lifetime subscription to Document 365’s Lite Individual Plan for just $69.97. No coupon is needed, but this exclusive price only lasts until October 31st at 11:59pm Pacific!

 

Document 365 Lite Individual Plan: Lifetime Subscription – $69.97

Only $69.97 through Macworld!

Prices subject to change.
